trends: There has been one other sighting in Dodge City
There were no other sightings in Dodge City on or around March 6th 2012
Summary: I was At my grandmas and i go to the garage and see these alien creatures with big black eyes.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was At my grandmas and i go to the garage and see these alien creatures with big black eyes. And they saw me! i looked at them and they looked at me. They were walking towards me I ran inside and locked the door. I saw a flash of light and the creatures were gone.
